concept.title: Bluetooth Management Collection Overview
concept.shortdesc: The Bluetooth Management collection contains the Bluetooth Manager and Bluetooth Client components.

section.title: Purpose
section.p: The Bluetooth Management collection contains the Bluetooth Manager and Bluetooth Client components.

section.title: Components
section.p: The Bluetooth Management collection contains the following components:

li.p: The Bluetooth Manager component stores non-volatile details of Bluetooth devices in the BT Registry using DBMS. Stored information can be retrieved, modified and deleted.
The Bluetooth Client component provides support for configuring and managing Bluetooth sockets, accessing the HCI, and configuring Bluetooth AV sessions.

section.title: Using Bluetooth Management
section.p: The Bluetooth Management collection has the following uses:

li.p: storing, retrieving, modifying and deleting details from the Bluetooth Registry using Bluetooth Manager
configuring and managing Bluetooth sockets, accessing the HCI and configuring Bluetooth AV sessions using the Bluetooth Client.
